rules_text:
{R}, Discard a land card: Eltensian Hospitality deals 3 damage to any target.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell while you're ancient, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](You're ancient as long as you have eight or more total lands in play or in your graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Scratch's return turned the world itself against undeath.[/i]
